comments:
The following new tests fail intermittently.  It is unclear if there is a timing issue in the tests or in the application container.

Failure from testPersistentSchedule02:

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Null results

at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.runTests(RemoteTestRunner.java:673)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRunner.run(RemoteTestRunner.java:386)
at org.eclipse.pde.internal.junit.runtime.RemotePluginTestRunner.main(RemotePluginTestRunner.java:58)

at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.app.AnyThreadAppLauncher.run(AnyThreadAppLauncher.java:26)

Fixed in HEAD.  The timing issue was in the app container when waiting for the application result the EclipseAppHandle.waitForResult could return early before the result was set.
